thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 4 of 1811
thread.title: Jean

author: Jean
title: Jean
text: It is great to get price alert drops that's my favourite feature I signed up for , however I spent many days comparing pricing and once I finally decided on a flight after booking work off, I locked in and did all the payment info fill in the blanks , twice , on the flight I wanted and it kept saying surprise your flight went up by 21 dollars each do you still want to book. This happened a few times and I ended up booking in a panic for 388 a flight instead of 368 it advertised a flight , and as a single mom the surprise was upsetting as I'm on a budget and use this site often so my last booking upset me as it still advertised for days and refreshed at 368 but at check out raised it and kept asking do you still want to book. I really would have waited for different flight dates and regret booking in a hurry as I need to add a day off with my employer which costs me more too . I hope it's not just a tactic to make you think you have to lock in fast before prices rise.
